articles.title: Americans endure searing heat to celebrate July Fourth - WBAL TV Baltimore
articles.description: Millions of Americans are celebrating the Fourth of July despite heat warnings, a projected record number of travelers and so many beachgoers that officials had to close some parks to latecomers
articles.content: Millions of people in the U.S. celebrated and suffered under heat warnings as they flocked to beaches and traveled in droves to toast their nation's birth with July 4 parades, cookouts and the always… [+5704 chars]

articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.title: Argentina bails out Messi in shootout to advance past Ecuador in thrilling Copa America match - USA TODAY
